title: Caramel and coffee cake with a caramel sauce and vanilla ice cream
description: Adding oodles of caramel to a basic coffee cake makes for an easy dessert to feed a crowd. If you don't have an ice cream maker buy good quality ice cream instead of making your own.
ingredients: 2 vanilla pods, split in half and seeds scraped out
1 pineapple, peeled and cored and thinly sliced
225g/8oz dulce de leche or canned caramel
